scripts.dev-build-dashboard: npm --prefix home/vue_app install && npm --prefix home/vue_app run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app --only=dev install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app run build-prod && npm --prefix home/vue_app install && npm --prefix home/vue_app --only=dev install && npm --prefix home/vue_app run build-prod
